name: 黃秀英
objective:
品質管制之基本觀念，應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質，管制圖，抽樣原理，品質成本，品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
The course provides a fundamental concepts of quality control, and management.  Basic theories and principles of quality contol will be covered.  The course will cover ”Total Quality Management”, ”Fundamentals of Statistics”, ”Control Charts”, ”SPC”, ”Probability”, ”Sampling”, and ”Reliability”.
